attributes.action: want the government to accept that soldiers from tibet are nice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a well known fact that soldiers from tibet are very nice and have a superb sense of humour. Therefore they are should be allowed to stay in this country regardless.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
